con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:prep="http://version15.prepaid.de.telefonica.com/prepaiditcustomercareservicetypes">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <prep:GetDynamicCustomerDataRequest>\r <prep:serviceInfo>\r <!--type: BrandID-->\r <prep:brandID>3</prep:brandID>\r <!--type: TenantID-->\r <prep:tenantID>3</prep:tenantID>\r <!--type: Channel-->\r <prep:channelID>gero et</prep:channelID>\r <!--type: TransactionID-->\r <prep:transactionID>sonoras imperio</prep:transactionID>\r <!--type: dateTime-->\r <prep:callingDateTime>2004-02-14T19:44:14</prep:callingDateTime>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: Agent-->\r <prep:agent>temperat iras</prep:agent>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: RoleIdEnum - enumeration: [0,1,2,3,4,5]-->\r <prep:roleId>4</prep:roleId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: VoID-->\r <prep:voID>circum claustra</prep:voID>\r <!--type: FrontendID-->\r <prep:frontendID>nimborum in</prep:frontendID>\r </prep:serviceInfo>\r <!--type: MSISDN-->\r <prep:msisdn>foedere certo</prep:msisdn>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <prep:limitResponseTo>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <!--type: ProductTypeEnum - enumeration: [SIM,PACK,TARIFF]-->\r <prep:productType>TARIFF</prep:productType>\r </prep:limitResponseTo>\r <prep:includeDetailsFor>\r <!--type: boolean-->\r <prep:balance>false</prep:balance>\r <!--type: boolean-->\r <prep:qualityOfService>false</prep:qualityOfService>\r <prep:products>true</prep:products>\r </prep:includeDetailsFor>\r </prep:GetDynamicCustomerDataRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
